mapper.sql: inquiry_no AS inquiryNo, inquiry_member AS inquiryMember, inquiry_title AS inquiryTitle, inquiry_content AS inquiryContent, inquiry_cnt AS inquiryCnt, inquiry_date AS inquiryDate, inquiry_update AS inquiryUpdate, inquiry_isopen AS inquiryIsOpen, inquiry_reply AS inquiryReply, inquiry_repdate AS inquiryRepDate
mapper.select: SELECT , (SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE member.member_id = inquiry.member_id) AS memberId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inquiry_reply WHERE inquiry_no=inquiry.inquiryNo) AS replyTotCount FROM inquiry WHERE inquiry_no = #{inquiryNo}

SELECT
FROM inquiry WHERE 1=1
AND inquiry_title like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND inquiry_content like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
ORDER BY inquiry_no DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inquiry WHERE 1=1
AND member_id like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO inquiry ( inquiry_title, inquiry_content ) VALUES ( #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry SET inquiry_cnt = inquiry_cnt+1 WHERE inquiry_no = #{inquiryNo}
UPDATE inquiry SET inquiry_reply = #{inquiryReply}, inquiry_repdate = current_timestamp WHERE inquiry_no = #{inquiryNo}
